requirement_designation: Science, Nature, & Technology Lab with Writing
course_description: Introduces modern experimental techniques and methods; the experiments include analog electronics, instrumentation and computer interfacing, cryogenics, and electro-optics.
prerequisites: This course requires PHYS 253 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
schedule_location: TTh 2:30pm-5:15pm in Math & Science Center - N309
sections: Class Nbr: 4041, Section #: 3, Type: LAB, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: J. Brody, Status: Open
